item.title: NYC's Rent Prices Are Too High for Recent College Graduates
item.description: NYC’s Rent Prices Are Too High for Recent College Graduates Rental prices in New York City are growing at nearly twice the rate of entry-level salaries. This means that recent college graduates are finding it increasingly difficult to afford to live in the city on their own.
